courtyard_statue.name: STATUE
description: The huge statue of Zandar must measure ten meters tall at least, his arms splayed wide, gown blowing in an eternal gale, staff in one hand, open grimoire in the other, as he shouts to the heavens. He is an imposing figure, slight though he is, with sharp features and a long, narrow beard that reaches down to his sternum.
Time has buffeted the statue, it's surfaces are thick with moss, vines climbing its cracked exterior

courtyard_iron_door.name: IRON DOOR
courtyard_iron_door.description: A heavy 'iron door' with an intricate keyhole blocks your path to the 'NORTH'.

courtyard_skeleton.name: SKELETON
description: The skeleton lies slumped against the base of the statue. It is ancient and yellowed, moss clinging to the bones. Shreds of clothing, bleached by the sun, flutter in the breeze.
Rotten arrows are still buried in it's ribcage, a cleft hewn in the top of its skull tells of this adventurer's demise. You wonder if this is also the fate that awaits you?
The skeleton's fleshless fingers are wrapped around what appears to be a 'key'. It is large and heavy with an incredibly intricate tip.

courtyard_key.name: IRON KEY
description: An ancient, rusty, key. It's surface is worn and pitted. There seems to be dried blood smeared on the handle.
You prize open the skeleton's fingers which requires a surprising amount of force as though, even in death, the cadaver remembers the importance of this item.
As you peel open the hand the skeleton crumbles as if finally defeated. You are left with nothing but the heavy iron key, which you place in your backpack

use.subject: courtyard_iron_door
description: You push the key into the lock and turn it. Within the bowels of the labryinth you can hear ancient mechanisms creak into life.
With a screech like nails down a blackboard the heavy iron door slowly swings open.
